Kremlin media quoted the head of the UN Information Centre in Russia as saying that UN Secretary General AntÃ³nio Guterres will attend the BRICS summit in Kazan on 22-24 October.
In particular, Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan, Chinese President Xi Jinping and Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian will come to Kazan. The Taliban terrorists who rule Afghanistan have also sent their application for participation.
